Topic.Title: "Why I (now) hate Apple"

Message.Msg: "They are a better idea than software licenses." I disagree. Even Bill Gates thought software patents were a bad idea before Microsoft had a large inventory of patents. He predicted correctly that software patents would act to stifle, rather than encourage, innovation in software. "The very idea that you have to buy software every year or so is ridiculous. Msft is a dinosaur going extinct." I agree. But not every software license requires that.

Message.Msg: "It just sounds crazy, recently a mailing from a liberal group sent out ballots for dead people, cats and dogs. Fraud is the intention here and we need to stop it." If that were possible, the GOP would be doing it like gangbusters. You're misinformed, and seem to think every dead person's ballot mailed in has to be democrat.
